summary: High definition textures for the bread introduced by the Hearthfire DLC.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8371/8455492572_a0902fdb5d_b.jpg[/img][/center]
==================
Requirements:
==================

Hearthfire DLC

==================
Description:
==================

My Dad is a baker, so when I saw the original resolution (256 x 256) of the Hearthfire DLC bread I cringed. Now all the bread has been re-textured at a 1024 x 1024 resolution giving the bread a delicious look.

This goes excellent with mods such as 'Perseids Inns and Taverns - Realistic Room Rental Enhanced' (with Hearthfire patch). http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25029

==================
Details:
==================

All the bread has been re-textured at a 1024 x 1024 resolution giving the bread a very delicious look.

Optional file:
Potato Bread with scoring on the top. Scoring is when you slash the surface (top) of loaves to allow for expansion as the loaf is baked.

==================
Installation:
==================

Just use NMM and activate, or you can extract the 'texture' folder directly to your 'Data' folder.

==================
Un-Installation:
==================

Deactivate via NMM.

If you manually installed delete:
textures\_byoh\clutter\food\potatobread01.dds
textures\_byoh\clutter\food\potatobread01_n.dds
textures\_byoh\clutter\food\garlicbread01.dds
textures\_byoh\clutter\food\garlicbread01_n.dds
textures\_byoh\clutter\food\braidedbread01.dds
textures\_byoh\clutter\food\braidedbread01_n.dds

==================
Known Issues:
==================

The Braided Bread texture is 1024 x 1024 but it doesn't quite satisfy me. I will probably redo it and make it better.

==================
Changelog:
==================

2/7/2013 - Initial Release

==================
Credits:
==================

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to InsanitySorrow for the ReadMe Generator this ReadMe is based on.
Thanks to my Dad, for inspiration with his bread baking.

==================
Tools Used:
==================

ReadMe Generator
Photoshop
Google

==================
Licensing/Legal:
==================

You must contact me and obtain my permission before re-packaging any part of this mod.

I made this with my own assets and free assets off the internet. Please respect that this is my work and don't upload/modify without permission.

==================
Modder's Will:
==================

If I am offline for six months or longer and do not respond to any attempts made at contacting me, then you are free to upload this project to another site(s) as long as I am credited as the original author.
author: Josh Ezzell
